description.oldValue:
Teams Rooms on Windows users can join Teams meetings using a meeting ID and passcode. This significantly improves meeting join experience for meetings across tenants or where room was not invited to the meeting.
GA date: August CY2022
description.newValue:
Teams Rooms on Windows users can join Teams
meetings using a meeting ID and passcode. This significantly improves meeting
join experience for meetings across tenants or where room was not invited to
the meeting.
